reviews.review: Best Game Ever.

Awesome sense of humor and great gameplay. The puzzles are just challenging enough without being frustrating. Anyone can complete them after giving them some thought. It's a bit on the short side - took me about 5h to comlete but a better player would easily beat in 3. Not that I'm complaining, the length felt just right. In addition there are some bonus chllenges which I aven't tried yet and it's definitely a game which you'll want to play again some time. Did I mention the humor? Youl'll love it!
I can finally say I've played Portal :)

Portal is Valve's first-person puzzle-platformer, released in 2007. Here are my ratings:

Pros:
+ Valve's Source engine
+ Voice acting and music
+ Unique, original story 
+ Amazing characters
+ Gameplay mechanics
+ Inovative design and unique physics
+ Probably best game Achievements with Advanced chambers

Cons:
- Story is quite short. I managed to finish it in about 3 hours.

There is no doubt why Portal made a big influence in gaming world in 2007. Characters, puzzle rooms and game mechanics are very original and award winning. I also really liked Achievement system. I managed to do all 15 of them, and they are really challenging and fun. Perfect game.

The cake is a lie.

In this game, it's do or die. So if you wish to win then you need only 2 things, logic and flexibility of mind.So if you think you can handle it then give it a try. For you'll never know unless you die.
Kesinlikle süper ötesi 10 üzerinden 10 verilecek bir oyun bence.Fiyatıda uygun puzzle/bulmaca tarzı oyunları sevenlere tavsiyem bazı bölümlerde beyin yanmaya başlıyor ;)

Portal is a great game.  The story is interesting and keeps you in the game with secret easter eggs hidden to add more life to the situation. Portal focuses less on fast actions hooting and enemies and more problem solving, precise shooting, and science. 

My one problem is that some levels require you to be a bit too precise with how far you place portals and how far you enter the portal and it sometimes became too tedious.

But overall, awesome game. The Snark of Glados shall reign.
Awesome game so much fun to play can get agrovating at time but still a blast
i love the game it's SOO fun i've played it like three times now :)

This game is addictive as heck. Unlike FPS titles, this game actually has you think and put things together and solve puzzles to be able to advance. The only real downside to the game is that it is fairly short and very beatable within a few hours (if you're a hardcore gamer that spends 8+ hours a day gaming, it's possible to beat it in roughly a 'day').

First off....The Cake is a Lie. This game is great. It really makes you think out side of the box while trying to solve the puzzles. Its challenging, yet it is not excruciatingly painful to figure out. I think my favorite part of this game is the comedy. To be honest, if you played this game without audio I think it might actually be a bit boring. My only real complaint about this game is how short it was. I completed the game (story mode) in one sit down. The challenge modes are very difficult though which makes up for it a little bit. If you like puzzle games and random humor this game is probably for you.

"Oh hey, you're the lady from the test! Hi!"

Amusing dialog. Challenging puzzles. Overall great fun. Yet like all such games it comes to an end. A rather sad, anticlimactic end. Oh well. That's why I got the bundle. Now to do the same thing to Portal 2....

"Where are we going?"
"Do you smell something burning?"
"I let you survive this long because I was curious about your behavior. Well, you've managed to destroy that part of me."
"That thing you're attacking isn't important to me. It's the fluid catalytic cracking unit. It makes shoes for orphans."
So much fun.  If you haven't already played portal, play it. Great game in a genre that is hard to make a success on PC.

This is my first detailed review of a game. 

[b][u] What is it? [/u][/b]

Portal is the story of a young woman (named Chell, presumably) who wakes up in a science facility (Aperture Science Enrichment Centre, to be precise) after being asleep for some time (read: few years). She is chosen as a test subject for testing a 'Portal Gun' developed by the aforementioned science facility and is assisted by a robot known as GLaDOS. This game puts you in Chell's shoes as you get past different test chambers with the use of the Portal Gun.

[b][u] Pros [/u][/b]
[list]
[*] Really satisfying graphics - I mean there isn't much variation in environment but whatever is displayed is in pretty good quality.
[*] Heartpounding soundtrack - you can listen to it over and over again (it comes as a separate free download with the game too)
[*] Groundbreaking gameplay - really, I have never played anything like this before.
[*] Mesmerizing voice acting - There isn't any voice acting in the game apart from GLaDOS' character but the actress (Ellen McLain) really outdoes herself.
[/list]

[u][b] Cons [/b][/u]
[list]
[*] Really short - I finished the main story campaign in a bit over 2 hours but including the extra challenges and achievements, it takes up around 7 hours.
[*] Kind of overpriced - for what it offers, the price tag of $9.99 is pretty steep but in the Orange Box bundle it is worth it. Separately, it should be sold for $4.99 I guess.
[/list]

[u][b] Verdict [/b][/u]

This is a fantastic game. Must play for all gamers, whether you like action, puzzle, RPG, etc. It has become a cult classic and has an equally, if not, more successful sequel aptly named Portal 2. This game isn't for the weak-hearted as the challenge maps are pretty darn challenging (see what I did there?) and a few puzzles took me up to 20 minutes to figure out (maybe I'm just dumb). The pros far outweigh the cons and it is the best game I have played in a long time. Something new and fresh (I know it came out in 2007.)

9.5/10

Portal (2007) это короткое и в какой-то мере уникальное откровение от Valve Corporation из далекого прошлого. Пазл от первого лица, с манипуляцией телепортации это прекрасное решение для того чтобы по свежему раскрыть интересную механику, и у студии разработчиков это отлично получилось.

Виду того что данная игра не слишком большая по продолжительности, создается ощущение что это демо версия, однако нет, скорее это ознаколение подводящие к более маштабной второй части.

Portal (2007)  прекрасна не только механиками, но и наполнением - от сюжетной составляющей сокрытой в деталях до отсылок ко вселенной Half-Life.

По скидке взять данный проект более чем можно, однако стоит отметить что это лишь предисловие к второй части, котрая заслуживает куда большего внимания.

最早言わずもがなかもしれないが、非常に良質なパズルゲーム。
「ポータルガン」と呼ばれる不思議な装置で、離れた2つの平面を繋ぎ、それによって本来であれば空間的に攻略不能なステージを攻略していく。
日常的には先ず使うことの無い思考法と、その実現手段を手にして解くパズルは、他の何者にも変えがたい感覚を与えてくれるだろう。
アクションパズルゲームとして間違いなく傑作であり、未プレイの方には是非ともプレイして頂きたい一作だ。

Nos encontramos ante uno de los primeros juegos de puzles en primera persona. Dentro del universo de Half Life, somo un sujeto de prueba en Aperture Science (La supuesta corporación que compite con Black Mesa) y somos escogidos para resolver un cierto numero de niveles, primero moviendo cajas, y despues gracias a una pistola de portales. Es un juego que no representa puzles muy dificiles, pero si entretenidos y te hacen sentirte inteligente. Ademas Glados, una IA que nos guiara con sus comentarios sarcasticos a traves de todos los niveles, recordandonos que tendremos como recompensa un pastel, si lo realizamos bien. 

+ La historia a una vez acabados los puzles.
+ Los mensajes que dejan otros sujetos en zonas que se salen ligeramente del recorrido
+ El set de mapas mas complejos
+ La traduccion y mítica canción del final

Alors par où commencer... ? Les graphismes ? Magnifiques pour l'époque et notre cher moteur source. La jouabilité ? Fluide, bonne, agréable.... cool quoi ! Les énigmes ? Parfaitement bien faites, en difficulté croissante. Le scénario ? Plutôt original, assez sympa à suivre. Un point postif ? Oui ! L'humour ! Le jeu est drôle du début à la fin grâce à un "méchant" plus que charismatique. Enfin la durée de vie est très correcte.
Portal est un chez d'oeuvre de l'industrie vidéo ludique donc ne réfléchissez plus et acheter le !

IT IS A FANTASTIC GAME

Recomendação deste game passando por alguns tópicos, e com uma breve analise no final com a minha opinião.

Gráficos: A parte menos importante deste excelente game são razoáveis.

Audio: Razoável, com exceção para a glados que faz comentários muito engraçados (o game tem legendas em pt-br, que facilita para quem não manja de ingles)!

Jogabilidade: É aqui que o game se torna sensacional! A sacada de usar portais para passar pelos puzzles torna o game genial, assim como o uso de física.

Enredo: Praticamente inexistente (o que não faz falta no game)

Considerações finais: Um game com uma proposta diferente do comum, fechei em uma "jogada" e demorei pouco mais de 3 horas. Recomendo demais para quem gosta de games puzzle, ou mesmo para quem nunca jogou um, recomendo experimentar. Volta e meia o game está em promoção, então vale esperar um pouco.

Nota: 9/10
